bibl.author: Henry Stanbery
bibl.title: Henry Stanbery to Orville Hickman Browning, 7 January 1868

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to transmit herewith the accounts, approved by me, and amounting to Seven hundred and fifty dollars, ($750:00,) of L. H. Bond, for services as assistant to Durbin Ward, Esq. United States Attorney for the southern District of Ohio, for the quarter ending September 30th, and December 31st, 1867; and to request their payment out of the appropriate fund.
